thread.title: Hottest most massive pair of joined stars is heading for spectacular disaster
thread.title_full: Hottest most massive pair of joined stars is heading for spectacular disaster

title: Hottest most massive pair of joined stars is heading for spectacular disaster
text:
Hottest, most massive pair of joined stars is heading for spectacular disaster 
Cnet Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Two giant balls of fire touching, the surfaces overlapping and forming a bridge -- the overcontact binary is a rare and dramatic class of stars. Now, a team of researchers has spotted an overcontact binary that's the most massive and hottest that's yet been observed. The two stars orbit each other in less than 24 hours. Called VFTS 352, the double star system is located roughly 160,000 light-years away in the...
